title: Army Cloud Migration & Ops
summary: Led full-stack AWS GovCloud migration for legacy Army applications with zero downtime, achieving 38% operational cost reduction and FedRAMP High compliance in under 120 days.

title: USAF AI Predictive Maintenance
summary: Developed AI-driven predictive maintenance algorithms using ML telemetry data from airframes. Improved mission-readiness by 27% while reducing false positives by 44%.

title: VA Digital Services Platform
summary: Delivering accessible React-based digital service portals with 508 compliance and seamless integration to VA backend systems, enabling veteran self-service access to benefits and claims.
